body_html: @lukaszkaiser When I use tf.get_variable instead of tf.Variable(), my training process is not very good. Specifically, I think the parameters does not update in every epoch. I have experimented it in the program publiced in tensorflow tutorial, it does has something wrong. Have you experiment it in your program? or I use it in a wrong way?

body: @lukaszkaiser  When I use tf.get_variable instead of tf.Variable(), my training process is not very good. Specifically, I think the parameters does not update in every epoch. I have experimented it  in the program publiced in tensorflow tutorial, it does has something wrong. Have you experiment it in your program? or I use it in a wrong way?
